column2: "Nna Sunsum no dze Jesus kɔr sar no do ma abɔnsam no kɔsɔɔ no hwɛe."
"Na odzii mbuada adaduanan adzekyee nye adzesaa
column3: na ekyir no ɔkɔm dzee no."

column2: "Na ɔsɔhwɛfo no baa ne nkyɛn
column5: kasa ma abo yi ndan paanoo."

column2: "Na obuae see dɛ
column4: Nnyɛ paanoo nko bi na nyimpa nam do bɛtsena ase
column5: na asɛm biara a ofi Nyankopɔn anomu so."

column2: "Nna abɔnsam faa no kɔr kurow krɔnkrɔn no mu
column3: na ɔdze no kesii asɔrfi ne bea sorɔnsorɔm no do

column2: "na ɔsee no dɛ
column4: tow woho kyen famu: na wɔakyerɛw dɛ
column5: Ɔbɛhyɛ n'abɔfoe mbra wɔ wo ho
column6: Na wɔdze hɔn nsa bɔsɔw wo
column7: amma aammfa wo nan ammpem ɔbo."

column2: "Jesus see no dɛ
column4: Mma nnsɔ Ewuradze wo Nyankopɔn nnhwɛ."

column2: "Na abɔnsam faa no bio kɔr kokwaa tsentsenntsen bi do
column3: na ɔkyerɛɛ no wiadze ahenman nyina nye no mu enyimnyam."

column2: "Na ɔsee no dɛ
column3: Yinom nyina na medze mebɛma wo

column2: "Nna Jesus see no dɛ
column6: na no nko na som no."

column2: "Nna abɔnsam no gyaa no hɔ; na hwɛ
"Na Jesus tsee dɛ woeyi John ama no
"na ofii Nazarɛt no
column3: ɔbae bɛtsenaa Karpernaum a ɔwɔ mpoano wɔ Zebulun nye Naftali ntoaado no;"

column2: "ma dza nkɔnhyɛnyi Isaia kae no aaba mu dɛ
column4: "Zebulun asaase! Naftali asaase! Po kwan do

column2: "Ɔman a wɔtse sum mu Ehu kan kɛse
column3: Na hɔn a wɔtse owu asaase sunkamm do no

column2: "Ofitsi dɛm aber no Jesus hyɛɛ n'asɛnka ase na ɔsee dɛ
"Na ɔnenam Galilii po ho no
column5: nye no nua Andrew dɛ wɔrotow eboa wɔ po mu; osiandɛ wɔyɛ afarfo."

column2: "Na ɔsee hɔn dɛ
"Na ntsɛmara wɔdaan eboa no gyae na wobedzii n'ekyir."
"Na ofii hɔ kɔr n'enyim no
column4: Zebedee ne ba James nye no nua John a wɔnye hɔn egya Zebedee wɔ hɛn mu resa hɔn mboa; na ɔfrɛɛ hɔn."

column2: "Na ntsɛmara wɔdaan hɛn no nye hɔn egya gyae
"Na Jesus kekyimaa Galilii nyina kyerɛkyerɛe wɔ nhyiamudan mu; na ɔkaa ahenman no ho asɛmpa no
column3: na ɔsaa nyarba nyina nye ahoɔmberɛw nyina wɔ ɔman no mu."

column2: "Na no ho asɛm tahyee kɔr Siria nyina; na wɔdze hɔn a wɔyar nyina a nyarba nye amandzehu horow ekitsa hɔn
column3: nye hɔn a mbɔnsam afa hɔn

column2: "Na nyimpadodow pii a wofi Galilii nye Dekapolis nye Jerusalɛm nye Judea nye Jordan egya kaa no do."
